title: New: Teen Daze – Winter Sun
content:
Does this guy ever stop? Jamison aka Teen Daze is undoubtedly one of the hardest working musicians around.

With a Two Bicycles release under his belt earlier this year, and his label Cultus Vibes going from strength to strength, he’s also graced us with a fresh new track from his premier outfit Teen Daze. Winter Sun (premiered on The Fader earlier tonight) is an electro-instrumental effort, conjuring up images of idyllic summer months gone by. As a stand-alone piece of music, it almost feels like it should be bridging the gap between two out-and-out anthems. Check out Winter Sun below, which will feature on a new Cultus Vibes compilation entitled Together, out 6 December and featuring the likes of Bank Heist, Parish Of Little Clifton, Manitoulin and Des A Boda.

Teen Daze, “Winter Sun” by The FADER
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
